ShardCursor¶

class ShardCursor¶

Used to navigate the results of a single channel query.

Public Functions

ShardCursor(History *H, std::shared_ptr<::Cursor> C)¶

Constructs a ShardCursor.

Parameters

  • H: A history object that manages this cursor

  • C: A non-sharded cursor

int NextStepCost()¶

Used to estimate the cost of calling ‘Next’.

Return

Returns a number representing a rough cost estimate

int Next()¶

Moves to the next record.

Return

Successful if the result is > 0. Returns CURSOR_OK, CURSOR_PRE or CURSOR_POST on success or CURSOR_END on failure/end of file.

TIMESTAMP Timestamp()¶

Gets the timestamp of the current record.

Return

A TIMESTAMP value.

double Value()¶

Gets the value of the current record.

Return

A double/floating point value.
